snippet: The groundbreaking decision overturns a 1994 Pentagon rule that restricts women from artillery, armor, infantry and other such combat roles.
abstract: Defense Sec Ashton B Carter announces that Pentagon will open all combat roles to women, with no exceptions; historic decision, which will open about 220,0000 military jobs, negates longstanding rule that had previously limited women from such positions.

byline.original: By MATTHEW ROSENBERG and DAVE PHILIPPS

lead_paragraph: The groundbreaking decision overturns a 1994 Pentagon rule that restricts women from artillery, armor, infantry and other such combat roles.

headline.main: All Combat Roles Now Open to Women, Defense Secretary Says
headline.print_headline: Pentagon Opens All Combat Roles to Women: ‘No Exceptions’
